name: Content (Non- Acdemics)
address: Mohakhali DOHS, Dhaka, Dhaka, Dhaka, Bangladesh
company: The pioneer of the Ed-Tech industry in Bangladesh. We are teaching more than 2 million students every day through our website, app, and social media to accelerate their learning.Our goal is to ensure access to quality education for everyone in Bangladesh through a wide range of free-tier and premium content for Academic, Skill Development, and Jobs segments.We are the only Sequoia Capital-backed EdTech company in Bangladesh, and we're looking to hire in our Engineering, Product, Content, and Marketing teams.
Responsibilities: Overseeing regular content listing operations such as scheduling live classes and exams, listing courses, and updating content for all product segments.
Working closely with the Content Team to receive and deliver content for frontend listing.
Coordinating with the Quality Assurance and Control (QAC) team to list and publish content that has been passed by the QAC process.

Managing content-related operations using 10 Minute School's Content Management System (CMS), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Teacher's Dashboard, CMS-360, Amazon's S3 Browser, and future internal products.
Providing feedback to improve the CMS, CRM, Teacher's Dashboard, and CMS-360 as needed.
Backing up and managing all approved content using 10 Minute School's NAS (Network Attached Storage) system.
Identifying and addressing user concerns.
Coordinating with the product team to ensure the proper fulfillment of product requirements.
Qualifications: Bachelors degree from any reputed university (STEM Preferred)
A strong understanding of Google Suite (Sheets, Docs, Slides), MS Excel, HTML, LaTeX, and project management tools is essential
Excellent interpersonal as well as leadership skills and ability to inspire and motivate
Strong display of proactivity, ownership and responsibility
Resilience under pressure and against deadlines
Strong written, verbal communication and presentation skills
Ability to adapt to a fast-paced organization culture
Additional: We are the fastest growing Edtech of Bangladesh. We believe in promoting a workplace where everyone has the opportunity to grow, create and excel.
Learning: Competitive Compensation | Fast-tracked growth | Quarterly Reviews and Feedback | Monthly training
health: Open Pantry | Game nights | Monthly Events
